description: A student in Houjou High School, and Kai`s best friend since his youth. Sakuragi is Kuki`s Master. He is well-adept at sports. Nayuta always calls Yuzuru as "Yuzu-yuzu". He`s very playful and loves games. He shows extreme loyalty to his friends, especially the ones he`s known for a very long time, and takes any affront to them as an affront to himself.
name: Sakuragi Nayuta
